sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './../ProfileCard/ProfileCard.css' const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; const ProfileCard = () => { const {user} =useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const profilePage=false; return (
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.worksAt ?user.worksAt:"Write About Yourself"}
{user.following.length} Followings
1 Followers
{profilePage&&( <>
3 Posts
)}
{profilePage? '': My Profile }
) } export default ProfileCard
